QuestData.Title: Orbiss Fades
QuestData.Description: I knew death would come. I did not know that it would come this fast.$b$bI must buy time. The mist of the Upper Sumprushes is warm and fragrant. Such mist is nutritive to my kind.$b$bGather this mist however you can... in jars, in vials, within the interior of your bags. Bring it back to me, and I can use it to remain corporeal for a bit longer.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 8 Gushing Mists by walking through mist geysers in the Upper Sumprushes.
QuestData.CompletionText: I require more mist. I am fading...
QuestData.RewardText: I told you earlier, this wound would be my death. While you have bought me a bit more time, it is not long now.
